resources.string: Please grant the storage permission to access your WhatsApp media files for backup and restore operations.
"For backup and restore operation you need to grant \'Allow access to manage all files\' permission. \nAfter granting permission, return to the app."
For backup and restore operation you need to grant Storage permissions
Create an offline backup of your WhatsApp media and restore it on another device
Create a backup of your WhatsApp media
Restore your WhatsApp media from a backup
